item.description: This is a group energy clearing focusing on the chakras, aura, male/female balance and more.  RYSE brings about your next level of harmony, health and wholeness. Expect to feel more peaceful, balanced, present and joyful. Event runs till 8:30pm.  For more information on RYSE and upcoming offerings from A Higher Balance, please visit www.ahigherbalance.com
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find us in the Hawthorne Bldg directly over Starbucks. Enter at the center doors and then the elevator to the 2nd floor.
item.why: Come to sit in a circle and receive a powerful, high vibration clearing for your energy system, leaving you peaceful, uplifted, energized and creative. Program runs 7-8:30. Everyone loves it!
item.name: Full Moon RYSE Group Energy Clearing with Judy Copp
